result.ga: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breithe
result.orig: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breithe
result.html: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breitheDid you forget my birthday?
result.ponchtml: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breiṫeDid you forget my birthday?

result.html: Breithlá sonaHappy birthday!
result.ponchtml: Breiṫlá sonaHappy birthday!

result.eng: We have to celebrate your birthday!
result.ga: Caithfidh muid do bhreithlá a cheiliúradh
result.orig: Caithfidh muid do bhreithlá a cheiliúradh
result.html: Caithfidh muid do bhreithlá a cheiliúradhWe have to celebrate your birthday!
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid do ḃreiṫlá a ċeiliúraḋWe have to celebrate your birthday!

result.html: Comhghairdeas ar do bhreithláCongratulations on your birthday.
result.ponchtml: Coṁġairdeas ar do ḃreiṫláCongratulations on your birthday.

result.eng: I congratulated her on her birthday.
result.ga: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithlá
result.orig: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithlá
result.html: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithláI congratulated her on her birthday.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé coṁġairdeas léi ar a breiṫláI congratulated her on her birthday.

result.eng: I am searching for a gift for my brother's birthday.
result.ga: Tá mé ag cuartú bronntanais do bhreithlá mo dhearthár
result.orig: Tá mé ag cuartú bronntanais do bhreithlá mo dhearthár
result.html: Tá mé ag cuartú bronntanais do bhreithlá mo dhearthárI am searching for a gift for my brother's birthday.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag cuartú bronntanais do ḃreiṫlá mo ḋearṫárI am searching for a gift for my brother's birthday.

result.eng: We will not be able to celebrate her birthday.
result.ga: Ní bheidh muid in ann a lá breithe a cheiliúradh
result.orig: Ní bheidh muid in ann a lá breithe a cheiliúradh
result.html: Ní bheidh muid in ann a lá breithe a cheiliúradhWe will not be able to celebrate her birthday.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeiḋ muid in ann a lá breiṫe a ċeiliúraḋWe will not be able to celebrate her birthday.
